title: Software Engineer
description: Looking for a skilled Software Engineer with 3+ years of experience in web development.
requirements: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field
Proficiency in JavaScript, React, and Node.js
Experience with RESTful APIs and version control (Git)

title: Data Analyst
description: Seeking a Data Analyst to interpret data and provide insights to drive business decisions.
requirements: Bachelor's degree in Data Science, Statistics, or related field
Experience with SQL and data visualization tools (e.g., Tableau)
Strong analytical and problem-solving skills

title: UX/UI Designer
description: Join our team as a UX/UI Designer to create engaging user experiences.
requirements: Bachelor's degree in Design or related field
Proficiency in design software (e.g., Sketch, Adobe XD)
Strong portfolio demonstrating design process

title: Project Manager
description: We are looking for a Project Manager with experience in agile methodologies.
requirements: Bachelor's degree in Business Administration or related field
PMP or Scrum certification preferred
Proven experience managing projects from start to finish

title: Marketing Specialist
description: Seeking a Marketing Specialist to develop and execute marketing strategies.
requirements: Bachelor's degree in Marketing or related field
Experience with digital marketing and SEO
Strong communication and teamwork skills

title: Full Stack Developer
description: Join our tech team as a Full Stack Developer with strong JavaScript skills.
requirements: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field
Experience with React, Node.js, and MongoDB
Strong understanding of web development best practices

title: Data Scientist
description: Looking for a Data Scientist with experience in machine learning and analytics.
requirements: Master's degree in Data Science, Statistics, or related field
Experience with Python and machine learning libraries (e.g., scikit-learn)
Strong analytical and problem-solving skills

title: Customer Service Representative
description: We need a Customer Service Representative to assist customers and resolve issues.
requirements: High school diploma or equivalent
Excellent communication and interpersonal skills
Experience in customer service preferred

title: Graphic Designer
description: Join our creative team as a Graphic Designer to create visual concepts.
requirements: Bachelor's degree in Graphic Design or related field
Proficiency in Adobe Creative Suite
Strong portfolio of design work

title: Sales Manager
description: We are looking for a Sales Manager to lead our sales team and drive revenue.
requirements: Bachelor's degree in Business or related field
Proven sales experience and leadership skills
Strong negotiation and communication skills
